scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "mix,tsc,node" -c "yellow,blue,green" "cd client && yarn run watch" "npx tsc --noEmit --pretty --watch" "npx nodemon src/app.ts --exec babel-node --extensions '.ts,.tsx'"
scripts.build: npx tsc --noEmit --pretty && npx babel --extensions '.ts,.tsx' --source-maps --out-dir dist src && cd client && yarn run production
